医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
加州大学洛杉矶分校选择在新的医疗保险替代支付模式下领导痴呆症护理加州大学洛杉矶分校已被医疗保险和医疗补助服务中心 (CMS) 选择参与新的医疗保险替代支付模式，该模式旨在支持痴呆症患者及其护理人员。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240719/UCLA-chosen-to-lead-dementia-care-under-new-Medicare-alternative- payment-model.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240719/UCLA-chosen-to-lead-dementia-care-under-new-Medicare-alternative- payment-model.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5c6a7ef7-ba7c-4e68-909e-7d5207a03c4b Fri, 19 Jul 2024 22:58:00 -0400 UCLA chosen to lead dementia care under new Medicare alternative payment model
研究证实联合化疗治疗睾丸癌的成功率很高一项新的研究表明，通过结合不同的化疗药物，即使一线治疗失败后，睾丸癌仍然是高度可治疗的并且通常是可以治愈的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240719/Study-confirms-high-success-rates-of-combined-chemotherapy-in-treating-testular-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240719/Study-confirms-high-success-rates-of-combined-chemotherapy-in-treating-testular-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a900a91b-bfe8-48e5-9eab-a5468bc4456a Fri, 19 Jul 2024 22:48:00 -0400 Study confirms high success rates of combined chemotherapy in treating testicular cancer
研究发现，新的 COVID-19 变体中的高突变计数不会增加免疫逃避北卡罗来纳大学夏洛特分校预测健康和环境风险的计算智能中心 (CIPHER) 的新研究发现，导致 COVID-19 的两种最近流行的病毒株：SARS-CoV-2 变种 BA.2.86 和 JN.1，尽管与 Omicron 相比具有大量突变，但它们在逃避免疫反应和引起感染方面并没有比其前身 Omicron 明显更好。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240719/High-mutation-count-in-new-COVID-19-variants-does-not-increase-immune-evasion-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240719/High-mutation-count-in-new-COVID-19-variants-does-not-increase-immune-evasion-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4362276c-ba9b-45a4-99a3-0bd2f787aaa9 Fri, 19 Jul 2024 22:40:00 -0400 High mutation count in new COVID-19 variants does not increase immune evasion, study finds
新型电子烟产品可能会将尼古丁成瘾与游戏障碍联系起来在《烟草控制》杂志上发表的一篇“行业观察”研究论文中，加州大学河滨分校的两位科学家对配备触摸屏、动画显示屏和内置游戏的新型电子烟产品发出了警报。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240719/New-electronic-香烟-products-may- Couple-nicotine-addiction-with-gaming-disorder.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240719/New-electronic-香烟-products-may- Couple-nicotine-addiction-with-gaming-disorder.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e3071d79-9afe-4229-9c31-f662ad02cac9 Fri, 19 Jul 2024 22:32:00 -0400 New electronic cigarette products may couple nicotine addiction with gaming disorder
DDX41：髓系白血病发生中的独特参与者2024 年 7 月 2 日，Oncotarget 第 15 卷发表了一篇新的社论论文，题为“DDX41 及其对骨髓白血病发生的独特贡献”。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240719/DDX41-A-unique-player-in-myeloid-leukemogenesis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240719/DDX41-A-unique-player-in-myeloid-leukemogenesis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=64770e52-0bb1-42b8-9bb0-c9dc7c7a46f3 Fri, 19 Jul 2024 22:24:00 -0400 DDX41: A unique player in myeloid leukemogenesis
使用 CRISPR 敲除 CD5 提高 CAR T 细胞治疗效果一项临床前研究表明，通过使用 CRISPR-Cas9 技术敲除 CD5 基因（T 细胞表面发现的一种蛋白质），可以大大提高 CAR T 细胞疗法针对包括实体瘤在内的多种癌症的有效性。来自宾夕法尼亚大学佩雷​​尔曼医学院和艾布拉姆森癌症中心的研究人员。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240719/CD5-knockout-using-CRISPR-boosts-CAR-T-cell-therapy-efficacy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240719/CD5-knockout-using-CRISPR-boosts-CAR-T-cell-therapy-efficacy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d3ede368-5517-4e1f-9137-acd8c7852e12 Fri, 19 Jul 2024 22:16:00 -0400 CD5 knockout using CRISPR boosts CAR T cell therapy efficacy
福克斯蔡斯癌症中心的研究人员确定了预防间皮瘤的新目标2024 年 5 月 23 日，《Oncoscience》（第 11 卷）发表了一项新的研究观点，题为“针对炎症因子进行化学预防和癌症拦截，以应对恶性间皮瘤”。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240719/Fox-Chase-Cancer-Center-researchers-identify-new-targets-for-mesothelioma-prevention.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240719/Fox-Chase-Cancer-Center-researchers-identify-new-targets-for-mesothelioma-prevention.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ae81a294-0bc6-4c77-a2f7-b1656368afc3 Fri, 19 Jul 2024 22:05:00 -0400 Fox Chase Cancer Center researchers identify new targets for mesothelioma prevention
基于 UCSF 研究的艾滋病毒患者肛门癌预防新国家指南新的筛查和治疗建议基于加州大学旧金山分校领导的一项全国性重大研究的结果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240719/New-national-guidelines-for-anal-cancer-prevention-in-HIV-患者-based-on-UCSF-research.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240719/New-national-guidelines-for-anal-cancer-prevention-in-HIV-患者-based-on-UCSF-research.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=eadfd46d-930a-40e1-a59c-0b99e454f92b Fri, 19 Jul 2024 21:53:00 -0400 New national guidelines for anal cancer prevention in HIV patients based on UCSF research
UVA 借助 Komen 资助推进精准医学战胜乳腺癌通过精准医学，弗吉尼亚大学正在努力实现一个不再需要粉红丝带的世界。为此，Susan G. Komen 今年夏天宣布支持 UVA 工程与应用科学学院应用系统生物学研究来战胜乳腺癌的努力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240719/UVA-advances- precision-medicine-to-defeat-breast-cancer-with-Komen-grant.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240719/UVA-advances- precision-medicine-to-defeat-breast-cancer-with-Komen-grant.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dd487afd-9ac7-437c-878e-8946f68f039a Fri, 19 Jul 2024 21:49:00 -0400 UVA advances precision medicine to defeat breast cancer with Komen grant
在 COVID-19 大流行期间，印度的预期寿命出现了大幅且不平等的下降这项由社会学系和 Leverhulme 人口科学中心的 Aashish Gupta 博士和 Ridhi Kashyap 教授共同撰写的国际研究表明，在 COVID-19 大流行期间，印度的预期寿命出现了大幅且不平等的下降。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240719/Life-expectancy-in-India-suffered-large-and-unequal-declines-during-COVID-19-pandemic.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240719/Life-expectancy-in-India-suffered-large-and-unequal-declines-during-COVID-19-pandemic.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cd3ef8c7-28d0-4711-8041-cb96d6e76a63 Fri, 19 Jul 2024 21:42:00 -0400 Life expectancy in India suffered large and unequal declines during COVID-19 pandemic
